definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
sung performance/to sing for an audience
speaking and singing, as in various forms of storytelling such as 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2] and 相聲|相声[xiang4 sheng5]/(music) rapping
to sing loudly/fig. to mouth slogans

sentences.english: So long as opens the mouth to sing, lengthens until the dream, hears the echo to be resonant.
sentences.chinese: 只要開口唱，直到夢想延長，聽到迴音多嘹亮。

sentences.english: Embracing warm blood, I sing of youth without regret. Look upon the horizon and know not when my ally would return.
sentences.chinese: 滿腔熱血唱出青春無悔，望穿天涯不知戰友何時回。

sentences.english: Peformances are many times on everyday.
sentences.chinese: 唱聖歌的表演每天都有很多次。

sentences.english: Take a sad song and make it better.
sentences.chinese: 找一首哀傷的歌，把它唱得更快樂。

sentences.english: First of all, I sing a song for country songs.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我爲大家唱一首鄉村歌曲。

sentences.english: After class, I always review lessons and sing some chants.
sentences.chinese: 死啊課後，我總會複習課文然後唱一些頌歌。

sentences.english: She is then serenaded by all the married women .
sentences.chinese: 然後由所有的已婚婦女爲新娘唱夜曲。

sentences.english: It's a tradition to sing "Jingle Bells" at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節唱《鈴兒響叮噹》是一種傳統。

sentences.english: I heard a girl singing My Heart Will Go On when I passed the Music Hall.
sentences.chinese: 我經過音樂廳的時候聽到有個女孩唱《我心依舊》。

sentences.english: You can also learn to sing some Chinese songs.
sentences.chinese: 你還學習唱一些中文歌曲。

sentences.english: You know, I've never heard you sing.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，我還沒聽你唱過歌哪。

sentences.english: Jessica's musical talents range from singing opera to playing the electric guitar.
sentences.chinese: 傑西卡很有音樂天分，從唱歌劇到彈電吉他她都會。

sentences.english: May I join you?I like the song very much.
sentences.chinese: 我能和你一起唱嗎？我也很喜歡這首歌。

sentences.english: All the way in the train the rails kept singing, "You're going to see Daddy-Long-Legs."
sentences.chinese: 一路上，鐵軌都在唱着“你就要見到長腿叔叔了。”

sentences.english: Now, follow me. please. All right. Can you sing it now?
sentences.chinese: 現在，請跟着我。好的。你們現在能唱這首歌了嗎？

definition: to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
sung performance/to sing for an audience
to sing and play (plucked string instrument)
vocal accompaniment/to accompany a singer/to support of sb/to echo sb/to chime in with sb
to be off-key or out of tune (while singing) (colloquial)
